channel.itunes:author: TWiT
channel.itunes:subtitle: This Week in Enterprise Tech explores the complex, cutting edge world of enterprise technology. Hosted by Father Robert Ballecer, aka Friar Tech, TWiET features IT professionals explaining the ins and outs of enterprise solutions.
channel.itunes:summary: This Week in Enterprise Tech explores the complex, cutting edge world of enterprise technology. Hosted by Father Robert Ballecer, aka Friar Tech, TWiET features IT professionals explaining the ins and outs of enterprise solutions.
channel.itunes:keywords: Robert Ballecer, Enterprise, Friar Tech, Technology, Leo Laporte, TWiT
channel.description: This Week in Enterprise Tech explores the complex, cutting edge world of enterprise technology. Hosted by Father Robert Ballecer, aka Friar Tech, TWiET features IT professionals explaining the ins and outs of enterprise solutions.

item.title: This Week in Enterprise Tech 28: Office 365 is Cool
item.description:
Hosts: Fr. Robert Ballecer, Curtis Franklin.

China loves UPnP, it's not the post PC world, Microsoft has a messaging problem, and more.

Guest: Oliver Rist, and Lou Maresca.

Download or subscribe to this show at twit.tv/twiet.

For additional show notes, visit the wiki page for this episode.

Thanks to Cachefly for the bandwidth for this show.

Running time:: 1:10:38
item.author: leo@leoville.com (Leo Laporte)

item.itunes:subtitle: China loves UPnP, it's not the post PC world, Microsoft has a messaging problem, and more.
